name: Skybreakers
description:
∷ Indulge in fast-paced battles for an exhilarating combat experience.
∷ Choose from four unique characters to transform your gameplay experience.
∷ Craft varying battle experiences with 9 unique weapons tailored to each character.
∷ Forge a distinctive build through a rich mix of character talents, abilities, and artifacts.
∷ Enjoy the thrill of random weaon bonues and relentless reforging.
∷ Use your custom builds to climb the difficulty levels and confront a variety of mysterious monsters and Bosses.


Strategize with Weapons, Customize Your Combat Style


The game features four distinct characters, each with 9 different weapons that can alter their moves. With 3 advanced effects for each type of attack - Basic Attack, Dash, and Ultimate - you can unleash multiple levels of damage, teleportation, disruption, buffs, and more. Engage in proactive combat and enjoy exhilarating, fast-paced battles.


Forge Exclusive Builds, Elevate Your Gaming Fun


Character weapons can create different play styles. Various systems such as talents, artifacts, random affixes, abilities, and bonds, allow you to create unique builds that greatly increase the replayability of the game. After a few rounds of exploration, you could be the next speedrun champion! Random weapon bonuses and map elements add to the variety of combat.


Embrace fantastical Monster Designs, Face Higher Challenges


Skybreakers immerses players in a captivating world a traditional ink-wash painting style. Players will gradually acquire resources and master various schools of secret arts to battle waves of evil creatures. Find your preferred fighting style, take on increasingly challenging levels, and experience a growing sense of excitement!
